address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the  I²c address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x0D`.

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

field_strength_x.docs:
The field strength in microtesla along the X-Axis. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

field_strength_y.docs:
The field strength in microtesla along the Y-Axis. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

field_strength_z.docs:
The field strength in microtesla along the Z-Axis. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

heading.docs:
The heading of the sensor in degrees. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

oversampling.docs:
The oversampling parameter for the sensor.

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

range.docs:
The range parameter for the sensor.

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
The temperature of the sensor. Per the datasheet: “Temperature sensor gain is factory-calibrated, but its offset has not been compensated, only relative temperature value is accurate”. Above example has an offset that you need to calibrate. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [QMC5883L Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/qmc5883l.html#configuration-variables)*
